sentences.sentence: I will betroth you to me forever; I will betroth you in righteousness and justice, in love and compassion.
sentences.translation: 我必聘你永远归我为妻，以仁义，公平，慈爱，怜悯聘你归我。

sentences.sentence: The feminine children here 12 then betroth of also have abundance of, 34 marry, is not not strange either.
sentences.translation: 这里的女孩子十一二便定亲的也有的是，十三四娶了，也不并不奇怪。
